actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend section 4182 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954.  Cibolo project, Texas.

summary.text: Provides, under the Internal Revenue Code, that Federal firearm license holders shall not be required to record the name, address, or other information about the purchaser of .22 caliber rim fire ammunition. (Amends 26 USC 4182(c)).

titles.title: A bill to amend section 4182 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954.  Cibolo project, Texas.
